title: Aider MCP Server
content: The Aider MCP Server is a tool integration point that connects AI agents to the Aider coding assistant. It operates via stdio protocol and runs in the current working directory, serving as a bridge between MCP-compatible systems and Aider's code editing capabilities.
summary: A stdio-based MCP server for AI-assisted coding

relationships.description: The Aider MCP Server follows the MCP Server Configuration pattern for defining stdio-based tool servers in agent ecosystems.
